products.title: Vitra Blackout Sunburst Yellow 89mm Vertical Blind
products.metadescription: Vitra blackout sunburst yellow 89mm vertical blind in yellow. Made to measure from 12.11 with free uk mainland delivery. This 89mm vertical blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
This sunburst yellow blackout vertical blind adds a invigorating splash of colour to your home, whilst blocking the light. Value for money and made from high-quality polyester-based fabric, your new yellow blackout vertical blind is perfect for office, bedroom and living rooms.At swift direct blinds, not only is is this bright yellow vertical blind hand made to your measurements, by their expert team, it also comes with a free five year guarantee!
 
 Product id: sdb-vtb1338 fabric colour: sunburst yellow material: 100% polyester lining: colour match backing - see sample headrail: white slimline headrail supported by white steel brackets - top or face fixable   slat width: 89mm slat material: 89mm or 3 1/2 inch slat width control type: smooth chain operation with cord tilt or wand tilt and pull energy saving rating: er3 - highest energy saving value - uv protection and effective thermal retention blackout: yes
